Article Title: Carmelo Anthony and La La Anthony are always ready to support their son Kiyan, this time for "The Throne"
Article Text:
La La Anthony with her ex-husband (Image via Shareif Ziyadat/Getty)

Kiyan Anthony was the star of the Crusaders vs. Bears game



Carmelo Anthony and La La Anthony attend The Throne semifinals

Kiyan Anthony , son of Carmelo and La La Anthony , was the star player for Lutheran High School in The Throne basketball tournament . The event, sponsored by the NBA Players Association and Gold Level Sports and Entertainment, saw eight teams competing for the top spot in the league, and the Crusaders seem to be at the top of their game, with Kiyan leading the charge. And Melo and La La were there as always to cheer for their son.The semifinal game in The Throne tournament was between the Lutheran High School Crusaders and the William J. Brennan Bears. As part of The Throne Hoops National Championships, fans were there to watch the game in hoards in East Rutherford, New Jersey. And along with them, Kiyan Anthony's parents - Carmelo and La La were also there to hype their son as he led the Crusaders to a win against the Bears.The scorecard at the end of the final buzzer read 83-56 in favor of the Crusaders. The young Anthony scored 17 points, 1 assist, and 1 rebound. The Crusaders beat Highland (VA) 56-55 in the elimination round, before coming face to face with the Bears. And now, after they beat the Bears, are getting ready to go up against the Eagles later tonight on March 29.Both Carmelo and La La Anthony are very supportive parents and rarely miss any important event in their only son's life. Kiyan, who has chosen to join the Syracuse University men's basketball team and is considered to be the best celebrity kid player in the field, will be following in his father's footsteps after finishing high school.And through all of it, both Melo and La La have been cheering for their son as he goes from one career milestone to another. The ex couple were sitting together courtside, as Kiyan gave a phenomenal performance inside of it.Read Also: Carmelo Anthony is dreaming big; wants to buy a $4.1 billion NBA franchise
Article Summary: Kiyan anthony, son of carmelo and la la anthony, was the star player for lutheran high school in the throne basketball tournament. The crusaders beat the william j. brennan bears 83-56 in the semifinal game. Kiyan scored 17 points, 1 assist, and 1 rebound.

Article Title: Derrick Henry: Derrick Henry sells his home for $1.6 million below asking price, signaling the end of his Cowboys dream
Article Text:
Baltimore Ravens Derrick Henry | Nathan Ray Seebeck-Imagn Images

Derrick Henry bought his Dallas home with hopes of playing for the Cowboys, but it never happened

The Pivot

Derrick Henry Ready to win in Baltimore w/ Lamar, NFL legacy, Alabama’s best & RB future |The Pivot

I knew once free agency started that I wanted to work something out [with the Ravens] if we could,

Even though I’m living in Dallas and Dallas being a perfect situation, as well, because we lived there, we ain’t got to move…”

“They ain’t holla at me at all,”

Dallas could have been a perfect fit, but now Henry is locked in with the Ravens

Baltimore Ravens ’ star running back Derrick Henry has officially sold his Dallas home, but it’s not just a routine real estate transaction—it’s a symbolic farewell to a long-standing dream. Henry, who was once rumored to be eyeing a future with the Dallas Cowboys , sold the property for $1.6 million, falling short of its original asking price. This move marks the final chapter in his connection to Dallas, a city he once hoped to call his permanent NFL home.Henry originally bought the luxurious 4,154-square-foot home in Inwood Park in 2022. Featuring 20-foot ceilings, floor-to-ceiling windows, marble floors, and hardwood flooring, the property was a high-end investment. The stunning residence offers four bedrooms, four bathrooms, and a spacious three-car garage. Designed for both comfort and style, it boasts a gourmet kitchen, a cozy fireplace, custom walk-in closets, and a lush turf backyard perfect for outdoor relaxation.He first listed it for $1.8 million in 2023 but later took it off the market before relisting it at $1.6 million with a different real estate agency.According to TMZ, the final sale amount has not been disclosed, but sources suggest it was close to the lowered asking price. The sale ends Henry’s residential ties to Dallas, a city he had considered home due to his girlfriend, Adrianna Rivas , having family in the area.While Henry’s Dallas residency was partly personal, it was also fueled by his football aspirations. The running back admitted onpodcast that he had wanted to play for the Cowboys.” Henry said. “Unfortunately for Henry, the Cowboys never approached him.he revealed, making it clear that the interest was one-sided.Many Cowboys fans were thrilled by the idea of Derrick Henry joining the team and teaming up with Dak Prescott. With his powerful running style and Dallas’ solid offensive line, Henry could have brought a whole new level of strength to the offense. His ability to break tackles and wear down defenses seemed like the perfect fit for a team looking to boost its rushing attack. But despite all the excitement and speculation, the Cowboys stuck to their usual cautious approach to building the roster. Instead of making a big move for Henry, they decided to stay the course—meaning the star running back never got the call.Now, he’s set to be a major difference-maker for the Ravens, strengthening their already powerful running game alongside his new teammates. With his size, speed, and experience, he adds another level of dominance to Baltimore’s offense, making them an even bigger threat. Meanwhile, Cowboys fans may be left wondering what could have been, regretting the missed chance to have him in their backfield. But for Ravens fans, this move is cause for celebration. Henry isn’t just switching teams—he’s fully embracing Baltimore’s Super Bowl dreams, bringing his unstoppable energy and determination to help them compete at the highest level.Also read - Cam Heyward says he "Stole" DK Metcalf from the Chargers, did he cross the line?
Article Summary: Derrick henry sold his dallas home for $1.6 million, falling short of its original asking price. Henry originally bought the luxurious 4,154-square-foot home in inwood park in 2022. With his size, speed, and experience, he adds another level of dominance to baltimore’s offense.

Article Title: 'F**k off!': Hardik Pandya, Sai Kishore go from heated staredown to hug in GT vs MI
Article Text:
Hardik Pandya and R Sai Kishore had a brief on-field spat during Gujarat Titans vs Mumbai Indians in IPL 2025.

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

'No love lost with Hardik?'

Why an icon from Hindi heartland became Chennai’s superhero | #dhoni #ipl I Witness

A heated exchange occurred between Hardik Pandya and R Sai Kishore during the intense match between Gujarat Titans and Mumbai Indians on Saturday at the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad. The incident took place in the second innings of the match, as MI chased 197 runs to win.The confrontation happened in the fifteenth over of Mumbai Indians' innings when Sai Kishore bowled a dot ball and gave Pandya a death stare. This provoked the Mumbai Indians captain, who responded by yelling out 'f*** off* and walked towards Sai Kishore.The situation escalated as both players engaged in a staredown at the centre of the pitch, requiring umpire intervention.However, they reconciled during the post-match handshake, sharing a hug and laughing off the incident.After the IPL match, commentator Ian Bishop interviewed Sai Kishore and asked, "No love lost with Hardik?"The spinner replied, "He’s a good friend of mine, inside the field it should be like that. Inside the field, anybody is an opponent, but we don’t take things personally.""We are good competitors. That's how I think the game should be," he added.Sai Kishore delivered a solid performance, taking 1 wicket for 37 runs in his four-over spell, including the important dismissal of Tilak Varma.Pandya had mixed fortunes in the match, performing well with the ball by taking two wickets for 29 runs but struggling with the bat, scoring only 11 runs from 17 balls. His dismissal by Rabada in the 17th over effectively ended Mumbai's chances.In the process, Mumbai Indians suffered their second consecutive loss of the season, failing to chase down the target of 197 runs. They managed to score 160/6 in their allotted 20 overs.Gujarat's bowling attack proved effective, with Prasidh Krishna (2/18) and Mohammed Siraj (2/34) leading the charge. Siraj removed both openers, Rohit Sharma and Ryan Rickelton, during the powerplay.Krishna made crucial breakthroughs by dismissing Suryakumar Yadav (48) and Tilak Varma (39) in the middle overs, helping Gujarat secure a 36-run victory.
Article Summary: Hardik pandya and r sai kishore had a brief on-field spat during gujarat titans vs mumbai indians in ipl 2025. Incident took place in the second innings of the match, as mi chased 197 runs to win. The confrontation happened in the fifteenth over of mumbai indians' innings.

Article Title: What happened between Anthony Edwards and Kevin Durant that sent Minnesota Timberwolves star to the locker room?
Article Text:
Anthony Edwards and Kevin Durant. Image via: Abbie Parr/ AP

Anthony Edwards received a hard elbow from Kevin Durant



The Minnesota Timberwolves faced a moment of uncertainty on Friday night when star guard Anthony Edwards went down after a collision with Phoenix Suns forward Kevin Durant . Edwards had to be escorted to the locker room after taking a hit to the face during the first quarter. The Ant-Man returned to the court, but the hard blow on his nose was a serious concern for the Timberwolves and their fans at the moment.When 2:43 was left in the first quarter, Anthony Edwards attempted to intercept a pass intended for Kevin Durant, but in the process, Durant’s arm caught him across the nose. The impact sent Edwards to the ground in visible pain, where he remained for a minute before walking off with assistance. The incident initially sparked concerns about a possible serious injury, as Edwards had a towel covering his face while heading to the locker room.Dane Moore of Blue Wire described the incident, stating, “Anthony Edwards headed to the locker room with a towel over his face after a collision with Kevin Durant. Looked like he maybe got poked in the eye or something.” Similarly, Duane Rankin of azcentral reported, “Anthony Edwards went down as he and Kevin Durant were going for the ball.”Edwards’ absence in the second quarter raised alarms for Timberwolves fans, considering his exceptional season, where he has averaged 27.3 points, 5.7 rebounds, and 4.6 assists per game on 44.1% shooting. With Minnesota sitting in eighth place and just a half-game behind the Los Angeles Clippers for the final guaranteed playoff spot, every game is crucial.Despite the injury scare, Edwards returned in the second half and finished the game with 20 points, helping the Timberwolves secure a 124-109 victory over the Suns. The win marked a four-game season sweep for Minnesota over Phoenix and extended their winning streak against the Suns to seven games. Edwards is currently averaging 23.7 points per game.Also Read: Stephen Curry returns to lead Golden State Warriors to victory over New Orleans Pelican Julius Randle led the Timberwolves with 25 points, while Collin Gillespie stepped up with a career-high 22 points and nine assists. On the other side, Durant finished with 23 points for the Suns, who have now dropped two straight games after winning four in a row. Phoenix also continued to struggle without Bradley Beal, who missed his sixth consecutive game due to a left hamstring injury.
Article Summary: Minnesota timberwolves guard anthony edwards went down after a collision with phoenix suns forward kevin durant. Edwards had to be escorted to the locker room after taking a hit to the face during the first quarter. He returned in the second half and finished the game with 20 points, helping the timberwolves secure a 124-109 victory.

Article Title: Will Corey Seager play tonight against Boston Red Sox? Latest update on Texas Rangers star's injury report (March 29, 2025)
Article Text:
Will Corey Seager play tonight against Boston Red Sox? Latest update on Texas Rangers star's injury report (Image Source: Getty)

Corey Seager's recovery and Spring Training outcome

The hype over Corey Seager's return against the Boston Red Sox

With the Texas Rangers set to play the Boston Red Sox on March 29, 2025, fans are eagerly waiting for information on whether their star shortstop Corey Seager will be playing in the opening game of the season. The Rangers' ace player, Corey Seager, had last year undergone sports hernia surgery in September 2024 and also missed the remainder of the season. His recovery and readiness to begin the upcoming season have recently gained attention.Corey Seager recovered after his surgery during the off-season in preparation for returning to the 2025 season at his best. News from the Rangers' spring training camp indicated that Seager was fully engaged in team practices without any lingering effects of the injury. Spring training was promising from him defensively as well as on offense concerning skills fans have come to expect from him. This meant Seager was ready to resume his day-in, day-out shortstop role when the season opened.Up to this time, March 29, 2025, there is no report of any delay or reason why Corey Seager will not play tonight's game against the Boston Red Sox. With his prosperous comeback and very active participation in spring training, it is expected that Seager will be part of the starting lineup. His inclusion will definitely boost the infield defense of the Rangers, as well as add more depth to their batting lineup.The fans who visit Globe Life Field or watch it live at home can look forward to seeing Corey Seager on the pitch once again and contributing his talent and experience toward the efforts of the team in the upcoming season.Fans will be eagerly watching as Seager takes the field, anticipating his impact both at the plate and on defense. His presence not only strengthens the Rangers' lineup but also brings valuable leadership and experience. With his impressive spring training performance, Seager looks ready to make a strong statement in tonight’s game against the Red Sox.Also Read: Corey Seager's Wife Madisyn Posts A Sweet Date Night Photo Before Rangers' Season Opener Against Red Sox
Article Summary: Will corey seager play tonight against boston red sox? Latest update on texas rangers star's injury report. Seager had last year undergone sports hernia surgery in september 2024 and also missed the remainder of the season. News from the rangers' spring training camp indicated that seager was fully engaged in team practices without any lingering effects.

Brian Foisy from BetMGM did not mention New York Rangers, Tampa Bay Lightning, Vancouver Canucks, and Columbus Blue Jackets in his list - the ones interestingly coached by recently fired John Tortorella. The ones where John Tortorella performed far better than he did in the Philadelphia Flyers . Instead, Brian Foisy brought our attention to new NHL teams, the ones 66 YO John Tortorella has never coached before. So, let’s look at the five potential NHL teams that would fit best for the oldest active head coach in the NHL.According to Brian Foisy of BetMGM,According to Brian Foisy of BetMGM,John Tortorella is a Boston native. The circumstances in Boston are far better than in Philadelphia. The core of David Pastrnak, Charlie McAvoy, and Jeremy Swayman could set a floor of contention.Tortorella’s coaching style may not mix well with the veteran players of the Boston Bruins.If Mike Sullivan ends up out of a job, John Tortorella could be the one to take it up. Tortorella has a history of being petty, so he may see an opportunity to join a cross-state rival like Pittsburgh.Would the Pittsburgh Penguins want a high-profile and high-dollar coach like John Tortorella?John Tortorella’s antics would probably play pretty well in a hockey-obsessed market like Minnesota. If Tortorella is looking for a team that could win now, the Minnesota Wild could be his top choice.NoneThe Athletic predicted Andrew Brunette, the current coach of the Nashville Predators, to be fired first in the offseason. John Tortorella could help the Predators rebuild from scratch with a mix of veterans and possible prospects.NoneThe management could roll the dice on a coach like John Tortorella, who could change their culture. Assuming they move on from Lindy Ruff, Tortorella could be a good fit for the Buffalo Sabres.Would John Tortorella want to join hands with a team that’s in an even worse situation than the Philadelphia Flyers?
Article Summary: According to brian foisy of betmgm, john tortorella is a boston native. The circumstances in boston are far better than in philadelphia. The minnesota wild could be his top choice if he is looking for a team that could win now. If the buffalo sabres move on from lindy ruff, tortorello could be a good fit.

Article Title: Connor McDavid’s wife Lauren Kyle stuns in new picture as the Oilers face another losing streak
Article Text:
Image via Lauren Kyle/Instagram

Connor McDavid’s wife, Lauren Kyle, stuns in a new picture as the Oilers face a losing streak again



Image via Lauren Kyle/Instagram

Connor McDavid, the captain of the Edmonton Oilers, is currently not participating in any of the matches for his team as he is busy recovering from an injury that he had sustained. The star player has maintained a low profile since his injury but his wife has been pretty active on social media. Recently, Connor McDavid’s wife, Lauren Kyle, took to her Instagram to post a stunning picture of herself.Connor McDavid’s wife, Lauren Kyle, posted a couple of stories on her Instagram. In one of the stories that she reposted of her friend’s, Lauren Kyle is seen going on a “field trip”.In the next story posted by Lauren Kyle, she looks stunning in a short brown dress. She kept her hair open and opted for black sunglasses to go with the whole look.Connor McDavid’s wife, Lauren Kyle, also opted for gold statement earrings and a gold necklace to complete the whole look. While it is not confirmed where exactly Connor McDavid’s wife, Lauren Kyle is, she posted a picture of her unique workstation.Lauren Kyle shared a picture of a bed placed under the open sky. The bed also has her laptop and a coffee mug. Lauren Kyle’s caption for the story reads as, “Office this morning”.The last couple of days have been a lot of fun for Connor McDavid’s wife, Lauren Kyle. The interior designer recently returned from a trip to Las Vegas, where she was joined by other wives and girlfriends of the Edmonton Oilers’ players to celebrate bachelorette parties, including of Leon Draisaitl’s fiancee, Celeste.Currently, both Connor McDavid and his Oilers’ teammate, Leon Draisaitl are trying to recover from their injuries and are not participating. While the team did win a couple of matches without their star players, things soon went downhill.The Edmonton Oilers are now on a losing streak as they lost a recent match to the Dallas Stars and recently faced a devastating loss against the Seattle Kraken.At the moment it has not been confirmed the exact date when Connor McDavid and Leon Draisaitl will be able to return to the ice.Also Read: Connor McDavid’s wife Lauren Kyle posts rare update of him as the star player recovers from injury
Article Summary: Connor mcdavid, the captain of the edmonton oilers, is currently not participating in any of the matches for his team as he is busy recovering from an injury. The star player has maintained a low profile since his injury but his wife has been pretty active on social media.

Article Title: Toronto Maple Leafs' free agency priority rides on Mitch Marner's future, according to NHL insider Nick Kypreos
Article Text:
Credit: Getty Images

Team gives priority to cap space ahead of contract extensions



Mitch Marner's contract situation hangs over



John Tavares and Steven Lorentz in wait-and-see mode



A make-or-break offseason for Toronto



As the NHL summer gets near, the Toronto Maple Leafs are adopting a guarded stance on their roster choices. Based on NHL insider Nick Kypreos , the franchise's first concern is Mitch Marner's future ahead of signing contract extensions on other players, such as John Tavares and Steven Lorentz. Toronto Maple Leafs general manager Brad Treliving is also known to be a Marner enthusiast.The Maple Leafs are said to be waiting on contract negotiations with their upcoming unrestricted free agents until they decide if Marner will remain or if they will have to spend cap room to replace him. “It sounds like pending unrestricted free agents John Tavares and Steven Lorentz will have to wait until the offseason for any contract offers from the Leafs if they are to stay. The Leafs’ top priority remains leaving enough cap space to either re-sign Mitch Marner or bring in one or two players as suitable replacements.” Kypreos said in the Toronto Star.Marner, 27, is set to reach the expiration of his six-year, $65.4 million contract soon, and he continues to perform well on the ice. He has 89 points in 71 games and is still an integral offensive player for the Maple Leafs. Yet if he reaches free agency on July 1, he likely will demand a hefty salary bump, maybe into the $13-14 million per-year area.Despite previous trade speculation, Toronto Maple Leafs general manager Brad Treliving has remained a strong supporter of Marner. The marquee winger wouldn't waive his no-trade clause at the trade deadline, making him the boss of the situation. The Leafs now have to determine if they can keep him or if they will have to look elsewhere.Vet Center John Tavares is also in his seventh and last year of a $77 million, seven-year contract. He has been contributing with 33 goals and 67 points through 65 contests. The Maple Leafs are not hurrying, though, to sign him longer term, holding off to examine how the Marner situation will develop before they commit long-term.Although Tavares is still an asset, Kypreos said his Toronto future will hinge on whether or not the club can generate the cap space necessary.In the meantime, forward Steven Lorentz is going through a one-year, $775,000 deal and has tallied six goals and 16 points in 69 contests. Similar to Tavares, he sits in limbo as the Leafs determine their roster requirements.The Maple Leafs' offseason plan will heavily depend on Marner's choice. If he re-signs, Toronto will have to manage its remaining cap space very carefully to complete the roster. If he departs, the team will have the cap space to go after other high-impact free agents.Also read: Toronto Maple Leafs sign NCAA standout Luke Haymes to two-year contract With free agency only months off, everyone's eyes will be on the Maple Leafs as they make their way through one of the most important off-seasons in recent history.
Article Summary: The toronto maple leafs are said to be waiting on contract negotiations with their upcoming unrestricted free agents. The franchise's first concern is mitch marner's future ahead of signing contract extensions on other players. John tavares and steven lorentz will have to wait until the offseason for any contract offers from the leafs.

Article Title: "That's the goal!": WWE President Nick Khan plans major PLE event in India
Article Text:
(Image Via Kyle Grillot/Getty Images)

Nick Khan aims to launch a major WWE event in India

Hindustan Times

(source: Hindustan Times)

Triple H Has a BIG Announcement for WWE Fans 🔥 | Netflix India

Also Read

WWE President Nick Khan has recently unveiled one of the most ambitious plans to develop WWE’s footprint in India in the year 2026-2027. The company’s president revealed that he is planning to launch a major premium live event (PLE) in India soon in the ensuing days.Nick Khan has spoken about the significance of WWE in India and said that India ranks as the organization's second-largest market after the United States of America. Previously, WWE has expanded its horizon to other parts of the world under Triple H’s regime. However, the company is now planning a major flagship event for the Indian audience soon.Nick Khan is planning to launch a major WWE event soon in India in 2026-2027. The WWE President revealed the company’s plan while promoting WWE’s arrival on Netflix in India.Speaking to the WWE President said: “That's the goal, and we're pencilling out 2026 and 2027 now. In one of our first meetings with Netflix after the deal was signed. Without asking, Netflix handed us a list of their priority countries. At the top of that list was India. And knowing that the race would come into play on April 1 in India, if it's important to Netflix, assume it's important to us. India has always been important to us. So we're pencilling it out now, and let's wait and see.”He further discussed how WWE in India is the second-most watched sport after cricket. Khan further stated, “During the media interaction, Nick Khan also spoke about how WWE is the second most-watched sport in India, only behind cricket. "WWE is the second most popular sport in India, behind cricket... There's multi-generational viewing. Families watch it together. Women and men watch it alone.”Previously, WWE CCO Paul "Triple H" Levesque announced that all WWE shows will be available to the Indian audience on Netflix starting April 1st, 2025. From now on Indian audiences will have access to events such as WWE Monday Night RAW, SmackDown, NXT, and other premium live events.This is not the first time that the company has hosted major events outside of the USA. The company successfully hosted major events in locations like the United Kingdom and Saudi Arabia, and now it's busy with its European tour, catering to diverse markets and audience reach.However, by aiming to bring WWE to India, the company will not only successfully solidify its global footprint but also help bring recognition to Indian wrestling too on the global map.
Article Summary: Nick khan is planning to launch a major wwe event soon in india in 2026-2027. The wwe president revealed the company's plan while promoting wwe’s arrival on netflix in india. From now on indian audiences will have access to events such as wwe monday night raw, smackdown, and other premium live events.

Article Title: Travis Kelce and Jason Kelce couldn’t stop laughing at Jayson Tatum’s honest reaction to his nickname ‘The Anomaly’
Article Text:
Jayson Tatum and Travis Kelce. Image via: Mitchell Leff/ Getty Images | New Heights Podcast (screengrab)

Jayson Tatum reacted to his nickname ‘The Anomaly’ while speaking with Travis Kelce and Jason Kelce



Where did Jayson Tatum’s nickname come from?



Boston Celtics star Jayson Tatum ’s reaction to a particular nickname has sparked plenty of discussion among fans and media alike. Tatum, who has been a star player for the Celtics, recently addressed the growing trend of people calling him ‘ The Anomaly ’ during his chat with NFL star siblings Travis Kelce and Jason Kelce in a new episode a their New Heights podcast .During a guest appearance on the New Heights podcast hosted by NFL stars Travis and Jason Kelce, Jayson Tatum was asked about the nickname that has been making rounds on social media. Travis Kelce, referring to Tatum’s Wikipedia page, brought up the moniker and asked, “Has anybody that is close to you ever actually called you, ‘The Anomaly’?”Tatum was amused. He responded with a candid answer that sent the Kelce brothers into fits of laughter. “Twitter is not a real place, I’ll say that,” Tatum hared. His reaction made it clear that he wasn’t exactly embracing the nickname, despite its growing popularity.Jason Kelce, however, had a different take. “I would run with that one. I like it. ‘The Anomaly’ is a good one. I don’t know who came up with that.” To which Travis Kelce agreed, saying, “It is a banger.”The origins of ‘The Anomaly’ trace back to social media, where an X user first suggested it, pointing out Tatum’s unique skill set. “Handles like someone 6 inches shorter, shoots pull-ups like a guard, finishes at the rim like a center, and consistently defends 1-5.”The nickname got wide attention, and soon, even official team accounts like the Portland Trail Blazers started using it in their game promotions. Basketball Reference has even added it to Tatum’s list of nicknames.Previously, when asked directly if he liked the name, he hesitated before admitting, “Ahhh, I don’t know.” He went on to mention that friends and teammates call him by other names, such as ‘Big Deuce’ and ‘Taco.’Also Read: Jayson Tatum's injury report (March 26, 2025): Is the Boston Celtics star fit to play against the Phoenix Suns tonight? Regardless of whether ‘The Anomaly’ nickname sticks, there’s no denying that Tatum’s game lives up to the title. At 6’10”, his mobility, ball-handling, and scoring ability make him one of the most versatile players in the NBA. He has been a standout star for the Celtics and is arguably one of the most complete players in the league today.
Article Summary: Boston celtics star jayson tatum was a guest on the new heights podcast. He was asked about his nickname 'the anomaly' and his reaction. Tatum responded by saying, "twitter is not a real place, i’ll say that"

Article Title: IPL match today, RR vs KKR: Dream 11 Team Prediction, head to head, Barsapara Cricket Stadium pitch report, weather in Guwahati
Article Text:
Kolkata Knight Riders' players Quinton de Kock and Rinku Singh during a training session ahead of the Indian Premier League (IPL) 2025 match against Rajasthan Royals at ACA Stadium in Guwahati. (PTI)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Pitch report for RR vs KKR

RR in IPL 2025: Rajasthan Royals hope for first title in 17 years

RR vs KKR Dream11 Team Prediction

RR predicted playing XI:

RR Impact Sub:

KKR predicted playing XI:

KKR Impact Sub:

RR vs KKR squads, IPL match Today

KKR in IPL 2025: Kolkata Knight Riders seek successful title defence

Rajasthan Royals squad:

Kolkata Knight Riders squad:

RR vs KKR head-to-head record

'RCB bowled really well in the powerplay': Ajinkya Rahane

RR vs KKR IPL 2025, Guwahati weather prediction

IPL 2025: How will KKR, MI, CSK, SRH, RCB fare this season?

After being outclassed in their previous matches, title holders Kolkata Knight Riders and Rajasthan Royals are looking for a quick turnaround when they meet in an IPL match today (March 26).The Knight Riders lost to Royal Challengers Bengaluru by seven wickets in their opener, while the Royals suffered a 44-run defeat against Sunrisers Hyderabad.Both teams share a common issue: their once-impressive batting and bowling units have failed to perform. While the Royals might attribute their bowling struggles to playing at a difficult Hyderabad venue, the Knight Riders lack such an excuse.Except for Sunil Narine, none of the KKR bowlers managed to restrain the aggressive RCB lineup, raising concerns about the effectiveness of mystery spinner Varun Chakravarthy, who struggled significantly. Even on Eden Gardens' pitch, which had some grip, Chakravarthy was hit hard by Phil Salt and Virat Kohli.The KKR camp is hopeful that Chakravarthy will regain his form on a Guwahati pitch that typically offers more assistance to bowlers.The Barsapara Cricket Stadium in Guwahati has hosted four matches in IPL history - two in 2023 and two in 2024. The highest total at this ground came courtesy Rajasthan Royals who scored 199 against Delhi Capitals. The RR vs KKR fixture was washed out last year at this venue.Yashasvi Jaiswal, Sanju Samson, Riyan Parag(c), Nitish Rana, Dhruv Jurel(wk), Shimron Hetmyer, Shubham Dubey, Jofra Archer, Wanindu Hasaranga, Maheesh Theekshana, Tushar Deshpande, Sandeep Sharma, Akash Madhwal.Yudhvir Charak/Kunal Singh Rathore.Quinton de Kock (w), Sunil Narine, Ajinkya Rahane (c), Venkatesh Iyer, Angkrish Raghuvanshi, Rinku Singh, Andre Russell, Ramandeep Singh, Harshit Rana, Spencer Johnson, Varun Chakaravarthy.Vaibhav Arora/Manish Pandey.Sanju Samson (c), Yashasvi Jaiswal, Riyan Parag, Dhruv Jurel, Jofra Archer, Shimron Hetmyer, Tushar Deshpande, Wanindu Hasaranga, Maheesh Theekshana, Nitish Rana, Sandeep Sharma, Fazalhaq Farooqi, Kwena Maphaka, Akash Madhwal, Vaibhav Suryavanshi, Shubham Dubey, Yudhvir Singh, Kunal Singh Rathore, Ashok Sharma, Kumar KartikeyaRinku Singh, Varun Chakaravarthy, Sunil Narine, Andre Russell, Harshit Rana, Ramandeep Singh, Venkatesh Iyer, Quinton de Kock, Rahmanullah Gurbaz, Anrich Nortje, Angkrish Raghuvanshi, Vaibhav Arora, Mayank Markande, Rovman Powell, Manish Pandey, Spencer Johnson, Luvnith Sisodia, Ajinkya Rahane (c), Anukul Roy, Moeen Ali, Chetan SakariyaAs the RR vs KKR head-to-head record reads, the two teams have played each other 30 times in the IPL, with the Royals and the Knight Riders winning 14 each. Two matches ended in no results.Interestingly two of the matches between the two teams went into Super Overs with the Royals clinching both of them.Guwahati is predicted to witness nearly 50% humidity while reeling 25-30 degree Celsius weather. The humidity level is expected to rise as the evening progresses which could make things daunting for the team fielding second.
Article Summary: Kolkata knight riders and rajasthan royals meet in ipl match today (march 26) knight riders lost to royal challengers bengaluru by seven wickets in their opener. Royals suffered a 44-run defeat against sunrisers hyderabad. The rr vs kkr fixture was washed out last year at this venue.

Article Title: WATCH: Mohammed Siraj dismisses Rohit Sharma for the first time in IPL with a stunning delivery
Article Text:
Mohammed Siraj dismisses Rohit Sharma for the first time in IPL. (Pic credit: IPL)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

WATCH:

Rohit Sharma vs Mohammed Siraj in IPL

Innings: 11

Runs: 82

Balls: 59

One dismissal

SR: 139.0

NEW DELHI: Gujarat Titans ' (GT) pacer Mohammed Siraj delivered a dream delivery to dismiss Mumbai Indians (MI) opener Rohit Sharma for the first time in IPL history during their Indian Premier League 2025 match at the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad on Saturday.After being sent in to bat by MI captain Hardik Pandya, GT posted 196/8, riding on a solid 78-run opening stand between Sai Sudharsan (63) and skipper Shubman Gill (38). Jos Buttler also contributed to the total, playing a quick cameo of 29 off 24 balls.Also See: MI vs GT Live Score Siraj opened the attack for GT, with Rohit Sharma on strike. After a dot ball, Rohit flicked two consecutive fours — one to wide mid-on and another toward fine leg. However, Siraj had the last laugh with a sensational delivery.Bowling a length ball around off-stump, the delivery skidded off the surface, nipped back in slightly, breached Rohit's defence and clattered into the top of the off-stump bail.Rohit was dismissed for 8 off 4 balls, leaving the MI camp stunned.This was the first time Siraj dismissed Rohit in IPL history, having bowled against him 10 times in previous editions without success.
Article Summary: Mohammed siraj dismisses rohit sharma for the first time in ipl. Gujarat titans posted 196/8 after being sent in to bat by mi captain hardik pandya. Sai sudharsan (63) and skipper shubman gill (38) contributed to the total.

Article Title: Who won yesterday's IPL match, CSK vs RCB: Yesterday IPL match result
Article Text:
CSK vs RCB (BCCI Photo)

NEW DELHI: Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) ended a 17-year winless streak at Chepauk with a dominant 50-run victory over Chennai Super Kings (CSK) in Friday's IPL match. RCB posted a competitive 196/7, with Rajat Patidar leading the charge with a fortuitous 51 runs off 32 balls, supported by Tim David’s late blitz (22* off 8 balls).Despite early fireworks from Phil Salt (32 off 16 balls) and Devdutt Padikkal (27 off 14 balls), RCB struggled in the middle overs, but Patidar’s knock and David’s late hitting propelled them to a solid total.CSK’s chase never gained momentum as they crumbled to 146/8, with key wickets falling early. Josh Hazlewood was the standout performer with the ball, claiming 3/21, including the vital scalps of Rahul Tripathi and Ruturaj Gaikwad, reducing CSK to 8/3 within the first two overs.Bhuvneshwar Kumar (1/20) also contributed, dismissing Deepak Hooda.Though Rachin Ravindra (41 off 31 balls) and Sam Curran (8) tried to stabilize, the required run rate surged, and wickets fell at regular intervals. Curran was dismissed by Liam Livingstone, and Ravindra was bowled out by Yash Dayal (2/18), who also removed Shivam Dube (19).CSK’s decision to send Ravichandran Ashwin instead of MS Dhoni at this stage signaled their lack of fight. Dhoni’s 30* off 16 balls, including 2 sixes, was a mere consolation.RCB’s bowlers, including Livingstone and Dayal, tightened the screws, and an outstanding performance from Impact Sub Suyash Sharma (4-0-32-0) kept CSK under control.Patidar’s fortunate fifty and Hazlewood's destructive spell were key to RCB’s historic win, marking a rare defeat for CSK at home and a memorable victory for RCB.
Article Summary: Royal challengers bengaluru (rcb) ended a 17-year winless streak at chepauk with a dominant 50-run victory over chennai super kings (csk) in friday's ipl match. Rcb posted a competitive 196/7, with rajat patidar leading the charge with a fortuitous 51 runs off 32 balls, supported by tim david’s late blitz.

Article Title: Muhammad Abbas: Lahore-born New Zealand batter Muhammad Abbas sets record for fastest fifty on ODI debut
Article Text:
Muhammad Abbas (Pic credit: Blackcaps)

Also See

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Fastest Fifties on ODI Debut

Muhammad Abbas (New Zealand) – 24 balls vs Pakistan in 2025

Krunal Pandya (India) – 26 balls vs England in 2021

Alick Athanaze (West Indies) – 26 balls vs UAE in 2023

(West Indies) – 26 balls vs UAE in 2023 Ishan Kishan (India) – 33 balls vs Sri Lanka in 2021

(India) – 33 balls vs Sri Lanka in 2021 John Morris (England) – 35 balls vs New Zealand in 1991

New Zealand take 1-0 lead in series

NEW DELHI: New Zealand's 21-year-old right-hand batter Muhammad Abbas made history on Saturday, smashing the fastest-ever fifty on ODI debut during the first match of the three-match series against Pakistan at McLean Park in Napier.The Lahore-born cricketer reached his half-century in just 24 balls, breaking the previous record held by India's Krunal Pandya, who achieved the feat in 26 balls against England in 2021.Abbas displayed remarkable intent, finishing his innings with 52 off 26 balls at an explosive strike rate of 200. His knock featured three fours and three sixes, providing New Zealand with the late fireworks in the match.Following his record-breaking innings, Abbas described his debut as "special" and credited Mark Chapman — who played a match-winning 132 off 111 balls — for his support at the crease."This is special. Can't describe the feeling now. Special to contribute, and Chappy was unbelievable. To get in there and show what I can do is special to me and my family. They're sitting in the crowd, so it’s quite special for them as well," Abbas said after the match.He also revealed the backing he received from New Zealand coach Gary Stead, saying, "Gary told me to go out there and do what I do best. That was the license I needed."Mark Chapman’s century and right-arm seamer Nathan Smith’s four-wicket haul powered New Zealand to a convincing 73-run victory over Pakistan in the series opener.With this win, the Blackcaps take a 1-0 lead, with the second match set to be played in Hamilton on Wednesday and the final match scheduled for Saturday at Mount Maunganui.
Article Summary: New zealand's muhammad abbas smashed the fastest-ever fifty on odi debut. The 21-year-old reached his half-century in just 24 balls, breaking the previous record held by india's krunal pandya, who achieved the feat in 26 balls against england in 2021. Abbas described his debut as "special" and credited mark chapman for his support at the crease.

Article Title: IPL 2025: Rajat Patidar, Josh Hazlewood power RCB to their first Chepauk win over CSK since 2008
Article Text:
Rajat Patidar and Josh Hazlewood (BCCI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

NEW DELHI: Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) secured a convincing 50-run win over Chennai Super Kings ( CSK ) in the eighth match of the 2025 Indian Premier League , thanks to stellar performances from Rajat Patidar and Josh Hazlewood CSK, chasing a target of 197, faltered in their pursuit, finishing with just 146/8 in their 20 overs.RCB, after being put in to bat by CSK, posted a formidable total of 196/7.The innings was built around Patidar's crucial knock of 51 runs off 32 balls, a composed effort that anchored the middle order after early wickets fell.Patidar's knock, which included four boundaries and three sixes, came at a brisk strike rate of 159.38.His efforts were complemented by Tim David’s unbeaten 22 off 8 balls, which ensured that RCB maintained momentum despite losing wickets at regular intervals.The standout bowling performance for RCB came from Josh Hazlewood, who wreaked havoc with the new ball, claiming two wicketsin the first over. He later got another one, picking up a figure of 3/21 runs in his 4 overs.Hazlewood was instrumental in breaking CSK's chase early, dismissing Rahul Tripathi, Ruturaj Gaikwad, and Ravindra Jadeja, all key CSK batters.His disciplined bowling ensured that CSK never really got into the chase, despite a spirited late attempt from MS Dhoni , who remained unbeaten on 30 off 16 balls.CSK’s chase never gained momentum as they lost wickets at crucial intervals.Hazlewood's early breakthroughs set the tone. Livingstone's wicket of Ravichandran Ashwin was a key turning point.Despite Dhoni’s late resistance, hitting two sixes and three fours in his innings, CSK’s total of 146/8 was insufficient.Hazlewood’s dominance with the ball, paired with Patidar’s vital contribution with the bat, led RCB to a comfortable 50-run victory, leaving CSK to reflect on a disappointing outing at Chepauk.RCB next face Gujarat Titans next Wednesday, while CSK travel to Guwahati for their next match against Rajasthan Royals on Sunday.
Article Summary: Royal challengers bengaluru (rcb) secured a convincing 50-run win over chennai super kings ( csk ) in the eighth match of the indian premier league. Csk, chasing a target of 197, faltered in their pursuit, finishing with just 146/8 in their 20 overs. Rcb posted a formidable total of 196/7, built around rajat patidar's crucial knock of 51 runs off 32 balls.

Article Title: Shubman Gill becomes second-fastest to 1000 IPL runs at a venue
Article Text:
Gujarat Titans captain Shubman Gill (PTI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Fewest innings for 1000 IPL runs at a venue

19 - Chris Gayle at Bengaluru

20 - Shubman Gill at Ahmedabad*

22 - David Warner at Hyderabad

26 - Shaun Marsh at Mohali

NEW DELHI: Gujarat Titans (GT) captain Shubman Gill etched his name in the record books during the Indian Premier League (IPL) 2025 clash against Mumbai Indians at the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad on Saturday.The stylish right-hander became the second-fastest batter to score 1000 IPL runs at a single venue, achieving the milestone in just 20 innings.Also See: MI vs GT Live Score Gill now stands only behind Chris Gayle, who reached 1000 IPL runs in 19 innings at the M. Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru. David Warner is third on the list, having accomplished the feat in 22 innings at Hyderabad’s Rajiv Gandhi International Stadium, followed by Shaun Marsh, who took 26 innings at Mohali.During the match, Gill and Sai Sudharsan provided a flying start, propelling GT to 66/0 in the powerplay, marking the first wicketless first-innings powerplay of the season.After achieving the feat, Gill was soon dismissed by his counterpart MI skipper Hardik Pandya in the ninth over. Gill scored 38 off 27 balls, which included one six and four boundaries, as the GT openers added 78 runs in 8.3 overs.
Article Summary: Shubman gill becomes the second-fastest batter to score 1000 ipl runs at a single venue, achieving the milestone in just 20 innings. Gill scored 38 off 27 balls, which included one six and four boundaries, as the gt openers added 78 runs in 8.3 overs. David warner is third on the list, having accomplished the feat in 22 innings at hyderabad.

Article Title: Virat Kohli becomes highest run-scorer against CSK in IPL history
Article Text:
Virat Kohli (Pic credit: IPL)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

NEW DELHI: Virat Kohli etched his name into the record books once again during Royal Challengers Bengaluru ’s (RCB) IPL 2025 clash against Chennai Super Kings ( CSK ) at the MA Chidambaram Stadium on Friday.Though Kohli struggled to accelerate, his 31-run knock off 30 balls saw him surpass Shikhar Dhawan to become the highest run-getter against CSK in IPL history .Also see: CSK vs RCB Live Score With this innings, Kohli’s overall tally against CSK reached 1,084 runs, overtaking Dhawan’s previous record of 1,057 runs. Kohli took 33 innings in 34 matches to achieve the milestone, whereas Dhawan had set the record in 29 innings. The two remain the only batters to have crossed the 1,000-run mark against CSK in the IPL.Kohli’s highest score against CSK remains an unbeaten 90, and he has registered nine half-centuries against them. He has accumulated these runs at an average of 37.37 and a strike rate of 125.46. In contrast, Dhawan's tally includes a century (101*) and eight fifties.Rohit Sharma follows in third place with 896 runs in 35 matches, while Dinesh Karthik (727 runs in 33 matches) and David Warner (696 runs in 21 matches) complete the top five list.
Article Summary: Virat kohli surpasses shikhar dhawan to become highest run-getter against csk in ipl history. Kohli took 33 innings in 34 matches to achieve the milestone, whereas dhawan had set the record in 29 innings. Rohit sharma follows in third place with 896 runs in 35 matches.

Article Title: MS Dhoni does it again, lightning stumping ends Phil Salt's blazing knock - Watch
Article Text:
MS Dhoni ends Phil Salt's stay with brilliant stumping. (Video grab)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Watch Dhoni's Magic:

NEW DELHI: At 43, Mahendra Singh Dhoni continues to showcase why he is one of the greatest wicketkeepers in cricket history. In Chennai Super Kings' (CSK) high-voltage IPL 2025 clash against Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) on Friday, Dhoni's incredible reflexes behind the stumps cut short Phil Salt 's blazing innings, leaving fans in awe.Salt, who was in terrific form, had raced to 32 off just 16 balls, smashing five fours and a six. However, his attacking stay at the crease was abruptly ended by Dhoni's sheer brilliance.Also see: CSK vs RCB Live Score Facing a well-disguised googly from Noor Ahmad , Salt attempted a drive but was beaten by the turn. As he momentarily lifted his back foot while trying to regain balance, Dhoni — faster than a blink — whipped off the bails in a flash.The decision was sent upstairs, and replays confirmed what everyone suspected — Salt's foot was in the air when Dhoni executed the dismissal. The MA Chidambaram Stadium in Chennai erupted as yet another Dhoni masterclass was added to his long list of iconic stumpings.This moment echoed Dhoni's brilliance from CSK's season opener against Mumbai Indians, where he had stunned Suryakumar Yadav with an equally breathtaking stumping. The 43-year-old legend, despite his age, continues to outshine younger wicketkeepers with his unmatched agility and sharp cricketing brain.With every such moment, Dhoni reinforces his status as a generational wicketkeeping genius, proving that in his case, age is just a number.
Article Summary: Ms dhoni's incredible reflexes behind the stumps cut short phil salt's blazing innings. Dhoni — faster than a blink — whipped off the bails in a flash. The 43-year-old legend, despite his age, continues to outshine younger wicketkeepers.

Article Title: IPL match today, GT vs MI: Dream 11 Team Prediction, head to head, Narendra Modi Stadium pitch report, weather in Ahmedabad
Article Text:
Hardik Pandya and Shubman Gill

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Pitch report for

GT vs MI

GT vs MI Dream11 Team Prediction

GT:

MI:

GT vs MI squads,

IPL match Today

Gujarat Titans:

Mumbai Indians:

GT vs MI Head-to-Head Record

GT vs MI

IPL 2025

, Ahmedabad weather prediction

The much-anticipated return of Hardik Pandya from a one-match ban is expected to inject much-needed balance into the Mumbai Indians ' lineup as they face an equally determined Gujarat Titans on Saturday. Both teams are searching for their first victory of the IPL season after disappointing opening matches.Mumbai Indians' perennial opening-game jinx continued with a four-wicket loss to Chennai Super Kings, while Gujarat Titans suffered an 11-run defeat at the hands of Punjab Kings in a high-scoring thriller.The week-long break between games allowed Mumbai Indians to regroup and engage in team bonding activities at Reliance's Jamnagar facility. However, the absence of Jasprit Bumrah and Hardik Pandya in the opener exposed vulnerabilities in their bowling and lower-order batting.Gujarat Titans' bowling attack, heavily reliant on Kagiso Rabada and Rashid Khan, will face a stern test against a potent Mumbai batting lineup. The lack of experienced Indian pacers and Mohammed Siraj’s vulnerability add to their concerns.The batting-friendly conditions at Ahmedabad’s Narendra Modi Stadium, which witnessed a combined total of 475 runs in the opening game, will be a welcome change for Mumbai’s batsmen after the sluggish Chepauk track. The boundaries are 64m and 66m on the sides, and the pitch looks excellent for batting. The grass covering is not expected to be a major factor. A score of 200 has been achieved 10 times in 17 matches at this venue. Dew is expected at the interval, making chasing the preferred strategy.Shubman Gill (c), Jos Buttler (w), Sai Sudharsan, Shahrukh Khan, Rahul Tewatia, R Sai Kishore, Arshad Khan, Rashid Khan, Kagiso Rabada, Mohammed Siraj, Prasidh KrishnaImpact Sub: Sherfane Rutherford/Washington SundarRohit Sharma, Ryan Rickelton (w), Will Jacks, Suryakumar Yadav, Tilak Varma, Naman Dhir, Hardik Pandya (c), Mitchell Santner, Deepak Chahar, Trent Boult, Satyanarayana RajuImpact Sub: Vignesh Puthur/Corbin BoschJos Buttler (wk), Shubman Gill (c), Sai Sudharsan, Glenn Phillips, Shahrukh Khan, Washington Sundar, Rahul Tewatia, Rashid Khan, R Sai Kishore, Kagiso Rabada, Mohammed Siraj, Prasidh Krishna, Ishant Sharma, Jayant Yadav, Mahipal Lomror, Karim Janat, Kulwant Khejroliya, Anuj Rawat, Gerald Coetzee, Sherfane Rutherford, Manav Suthar, Kumar Kushagra, Arshad Khan, Gurnoor Brar, Nishant SindhuHardik Pandya (c), Rohit Sharma, Suryakumar Yadav, Robin Minz, Ryan Rickelton (wk), Shrijith Krishnan (wk), Bevon Jacobs, Tilak Varma, Naman Dhir, Will Jacks, Mitchell Santner, Raj Angad Bawa, Vignesh Puthur, Corbin Bosch, Trent Boult, Karn Sharma, Deepak Chahar, Ashwani Kumar, Reece Topley, VS Penmetsa, Arjun Tendulkar, Mujeeb Ur Rahman, Jasprit BumrahIn their previous five encounters, Gujarat Titans hold a slight edge, winning three matches, while Mumbai Indians have emerged victorious twice. Both teams will be eager to outplay each other in what promises to be a closely contested match.Ahmedabad is expected to have a hot and sunny evening with no possibility of rain. The temperature is likely to hover just above 30 degrees Celsius under clear skies, making for ideal playing conditions.
Article Summary: Hardik pandya set to return for mumbai indians after one-match ban. Both teams are searching for their first victory of the ipl season. Gujarat titans hold a slight edge, winning three matches, while mumbai indians have emerged victorious. The temperature is likely to hover just above 30 degrees celsius under clear skies.

Article Title: Watch: Ashish Nehra screams his lungs out at GT squad during batting collapse vs MI
Article Text:
Gujarat Titans coach Ashish Nehra on the sidelines during the match against Mumbai Indians in IPL 2025. (Image: X/Screenshot)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. Why an icon from Hindi heartland became Chennai’s superhero | #dhoni #ipl I Witness Gujarat Titans head coach Ashish Nehra displayed visible frustration during Saturday's IPL 2025 match against Mumbai Indians at the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad. His reaction came after Gujarat lost five wickets in the final 13 balls, finishing at 196 for eight, though they eventually won by 36 runs.Gujarat's innings started promisingly with opener Sai Sudharsan scoring a powerful 63 runs off 41 balls. The team was well-positioned at 170 for three after 17 overs.Mumbai Indians' effective death-over bowling led to a dramatic collapse for Gujarat. They lost three wickets in just three balls, moving from 179 for four to 179 for six between the 17.5 and 18.2 overs, with Sherfane Rutherford's dismissal by Deepak Chahar particularly triggering Nehra's outburst.This marked Gujarat's second batting collapse in IPL 2025. Their previous collapse occurred against Punjab Kings during a 244-run chase, where they went from 169 for two in the 14th over to 232 for five by the 20th over.Sudharshan's performance marked his second consecutive fifty in the league, following his 74 against Punjab. The Gujarat fast bowlers then secured the team's first IPL 2025 victory.Mohammad Siraj made early inroads by dismissing both openers, Rohit Sharma and Ryan Rickelton, during the powerplay. Prasidh Krishna played a crucial role by taking the wickets of Suryakumar Yadav (48) and Tilak Varma (39), effectively stopping Mumbai's comeback attempt.The victory gave Gujarat their first points of the season, following their previous high-scoring loss to Punjab by 11 runs. For Mumbai Indians, this resulted in their second consecutive defeat, coming after their four-wicket loss to Chennai Kings the previous Sunday.
Article Summary: Gujarat lost five wickets in the final 13 balls to lose by 36 runs. Coach ashish nehra displayed visible frustration during the match. Gujarat's innings started promisingly with sai sudharsan scoring 63. Mumbai indians' effective death-over bowling led to a dramatic collapse.
